title: Font ID Help
content:
Hey, this is my second post and let me say it sure is great to be apart of Typophile.  
Anyway I was wondering if anyone knew which font the white one was in the picture. Sorry its only numbers, but if it helps I think this was taken from Time magazine.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206013016im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Image015_6194.jpg)

 [‹ Near clone of Optima on early rulebooks for Traveller role-playing game (late 1970s-early 1980s)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206013016/http:/typophile.com/node/49704 "Go to previous forum topic") [Almost Expressa, but not quite... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206013016/http:/typophile.com/node/50113 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Matthew Nicoll

comments.content: [Futura Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20081206013016/http:/www.identifont.com/show?61W) I think, like the big S and C (?) in the left corner.
